title: SOLD: 18 Different 1879-80 New York Clipper Wooducts (EX-MT)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 18 Different 1879-80 New York Clipper Wooducts (EX-MT)
posts.post_content:
Good Morning, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very rare group of 1879-80 New York Clipper Woodcuts picturing baseball players from the 19th Century and appearing in the 2011 Standard Catalogue of Baseball Cards. Here is a list of these beauties available for sale with a price of $SOLD dlvd. on each. :pA few sample scans are provided and scans of every individual woodcut are available upon request. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]


John J. Farrow (Catcher - Jersey City)
John T. O'Connor (Catcher - New Bedford)
Douglas Allison (Catcher - Capitol Citys (Albany))
Ned Williamson (3rd Base - Chicago)
Sam Wright (Shortstop - Cincinnati)
A.J. Leonard (Shortstop - Rochester)
John J. Burdock (2nd Base - Boston)
Paul A. Hines (Centerfielder - Providence)
John Lynch (Pitcher - Washington D.C.)
Fred Dunlap (2nd Base - Albany)
Levi S. Meyerle (Washington D.C.)
Stephen A. Libby (1st Base - Buffalo)
H.F. McCormick (Pitcher - Syracuse)
Thomas Poorman (Pitcher - Jersey City)
Charles N. Snyder (Catcher - Boston)
Andrew J. Piercy (Catcher - Oakland)
Thomas York (Leftfielder - Providence)
Philip Baker (Centerfielder - Washington D.C.)
